p: Results: Baseline data (March – April 2014) showed 34% daily mobilisation in the target group. Performance improved to a median of 95% by November 2014 and has been maintained from January to November 2015 at 94%. Our daily mobilisation aim was increased to 30 minutes in June 2015 and to 45 minutes in October 2015. We saw a reduction of 1.2 days in our ventilator length of stay September 2014 as better reliability in active mobilisation was achieved.
